structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: Each person becoming a member on the date of establishment shall be entitled to full credit for all service rendered prior to such date. Each person becoming a member after the date of establishment shall be entitled to credit after such date, provided contributions are made or, after August 1, 1982, picked up pursuant to KRS 67A.510(2) for all such subsequent service. Total service shall include prior service and membership service.

In the computation of service credit, nine (9) months or more of service during a year shall entitle a member for one (1) year of service; six (6) to nine (9) months of service shall constitute three-quarters (3/4) of a year; three (3) to six (6) months, one-half (1/2) year; less than three (3) months, one-quarter (1/4) of a year.

law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 166, sec. 39, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 106, sec. 5, effective July 1, 1974.
